itemDescription: Director of the British Rayon Research Association from 1948 to 1958 (1890-1976)

wikipedia_page.main: John Wilson, CBE, MC & Bar, FRIC (6 September 1890 – 8 September 1976) was Director of the British Rayon Research Association from 1948 to 1958. He was married to Edith Wilson (née Leech) and had six children.
